meanings.definition: A type of predatory sea snail.
meanings.sent1: The murexes crawled slowly along the ocean floor, searching for their next meal.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the murexes to learn more about their behavior in the wild.
meanings.sent3: The murexes decided to have a race to see who could reach the finish line first.
meanings.sent4: The murexes' shells were like colorful jewels scattered on the beach.
meanings.sent5: The children were fascinated by the murexes' intricate patterns and shapes.

meanings.definition: The plural form of murex, a type of predatory sea snail.
meanings.sent1: In the museum, you can see a collection of murexes from different parts of the world.
meanings.sent2: The divers found a hidden treasure trove of murexes hidden beneath the coral reef.
meanings.sent3: The chef prepared a delicious seafood dish using fresh murexes as the main ingredient.
meanings.sent4: The market was bustling with vendors selling murexes and other exotic shells.
meanings.sent5: The beachcombers were delighted to find rare murexes washed up on the shore.
